summary: Replaces the wolf models with the husky one from the Dawnguard dlc.
descriptionHtml:
Made upon request.

If you are tired of the vanilla wolves looking like starving hellhounds then this mod is for you. This simple mod replaces the vanilla wolf models with the Husky meshes from Dawnguard. It always bothered me that normal wolves had thin tails like domestic dogs while the husky tails are more thick. The huskies even look well-fed.

This mod doesnt affect the flame wolf or conjured familiar.

I recommend installing a texture replacer that enhances the look of the wolves, such as Bellyaches Animals And Creatures Pack; http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3621/?

Now requires Dawnguard.
author: T3alrose
